entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.9°C
